alert.note: Alert for Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:22PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN MOBILE... NORTHEASTERN GEORGE AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 721 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 6 miles northeast of Lucedale. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfcrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
